mapper.select: select rowid from tbl_sequence where tid='F002'
mapper.update: update tbl_sequence set rowid = #{rowid} where tid='F002'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file (fid, route, bid, ismain) values (#{fid}, #{route}, #{bid}, #{ismain})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_file where bid=#{bid} order by regdate
